content.html: How does anyone with the speed and precog ability to block a plasma bolt with a laser sword ever get hit by a punch? This is that fight consistency stuff that always drives @weschatham nuts when we talk movies.
content.value:
How does anyone with the speed and precog ability to block a plasma bolt with a laser sword ever get hit by a punch?

This is that fight consistency stuff that always drives @weschatham nuts when we talk movies.
